metadata.title: CVE-2024-46700 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/mes: fix mes ring buffer overflowwait memory room until enough before writing mes packetsto avoid ring buffer overflow.v2: squash in sched_hw_submission fix(cherry picked from commit 34e087e8920e635c62e2ed6a758b0cd27f836d13)

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
